game.name: Doll Creator Halloween Theme
game.description:
Your craze for Halloween is not over and you start searching for the platform where you can enjoy the spirit of the festival in your own style. If this is the case, you have come at the right place where you can fulfill your fantasy for fashion and Halloween at the same time. Do you want to explore this amazing fun opportunity? Join Doll Creator Halloween Theme and be prepared to help the three popular Disney princesses to find the perfect spooky outfits!

Hey girls! Be careful and try to complete the task as fast as you can since all the guests have already come to their house! Browse through their wardrobe to know what kind of spooky dresses and accessories they contain in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games! You have to dress them up one by one. Start with the first princess and then move to the second and third one! You would find a huge variety of hairstyles, skin colors, eye colors, and face masks.

You can give your princesses a one-piece outfit or choose pants and shirts for them. Combine their looks with a pair of matching shoes, handbags, earrings and a necklace! There are different hairstyles, eye styles and Halloween face masks to choose from. You would be given three chances to create a perfect Halloween doll. Good luck helping your dolls to spot the best Halloween inspired outfits and have the best time at the darkest night of the year!
